reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here as part of a group tour in May 2007. This is a charming little hotel with a great location - just about a block away from the main square. The rooms are clean and bright, with comfortable beds. The hotel is arranged around a courtyard which is set up with tables and chairs to enjoy the sun. The people at the front desk were very helpful when we asked for directions. We were also happy with the hotel laundry service. If you tend to go to bed early, be sure to request a room that is not over the main doors to the hotel. These are closed after 10 or 11pm every night and are noisy to open when people come back to the hotel late at night. The only criticism I had was with the floor in the room. Although it was swept daily, it really needed to be mopped. I would absolutely stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

likes.liked: — Great location in the heart of Cusco, free internet in the lobby
likes.disliked: — Floors in the room needed to be mopped

reviews.text: Stayed here for a total of 5 nites during our superb Gap Adventures trip in Peru in January 2009.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in the centre of Cusco

likes.liked: — Good value for money, lovely staff

reviews.text: Ok, this place isnt 5 star luxury, but for the price we paid as part of the trip, it was very good value for money. It is a small, family run type of hotel, the staff are really friendly and helpful, the courtyard is a lovely suntrap to catch a few rays after a days sightseeing.
reviews.title: Dissapointing, but not the worst

reviews.text: The rooms are comfortable, well sized if a little basic, but the tv has loads of channels, including plenty in English. The bathroom is grand, not terribly modern but just fine.
reviews.title: A Realistic Option

reviews.text: There is no restaurant in the hotel, but the main square is just a block away, with loads of dining options, and i would highly recommend the Fallen Angel restaurant that our local tour leader recommended...
reviews.title: Bed Bugs!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast is basic enough with only a few choices. There are 2 PCs in the lobby with free internet access.
reviews.title: Cozy little hotel in Cusco
